SELECT A.CODE_ID , A.CODE_ID_NM , A.CODE_ID_DC , A.USE_AT , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTCCMMNCODE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CODE_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.CODE_ID_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTCCMMNCODE A , COMTCCMMNCLCODE B WHERE A.CL_CODE = B.CL_CODE
AND CODE_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND CODE_ID_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT B.CL_CODE_NM clCodeNm , A.CL_CODE clCode , A.CODE_ID codeId , A.CODE_ID_NM codeIdNm , A.CODE_ID_DC codeIdDc , A.USE_AT useAt FROM COMTCCMMNCODE A , COMTCCMMNCLCODE B WHERE A.CL_CODE = B.CL_CODE AND A.CODE_ID = #{codeId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO COMTCCMMNCODE A USING db_root ON A.CODE_ID = #{codeId} WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CODE_ID_NM = #{codeIdNm}, CODE_ID_DC = #{codeIdDc}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{frstRegisterId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CODE_ID, CODE_ID_NM, CODE_ID_DC, CL_CODE, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{codeId}, #{codeIdNm}, #{codeIdDc}, #{clCode}, #{useAt}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId})
